pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["Kubernetes 是用于自动部署，扩展和管理容器化应用程序的开源系统。详情可见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://kubernetes.io/zh/","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方介绍"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在以下 URL 中，所有仓库的公钥均相同，因此只需要将仓库地址中的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"v1.28"}]," 修改为所需的版本。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debianubuntu-用户","children":"Debian/Ubuntu 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先导入 gpg key："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"curl -fsSL https://pkgs.k8s.io/core:/stable:/v1.28/deb/Release.key | {{sudo}}gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/kubernetes-apt-keyring.gpg","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/kubernetes.list"}],"，内容为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/kubernetes.list","menus":[{"title":"使用 CRI-O","items":[["否",{"cri_o":"# "}],["是",{"cri_o":""}]]}],"code":"deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/kubernetes-apt-keyring.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/core:/stable:/v1.28/deb/ /
{{cri_o}}deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/kubernetes-apt-keyring.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/addons:/cri-o:/stable:/v1.28/deb/ /","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rhelcentos-用户","children":"RHEL/CentOS 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/kubernetes.repo"}],"，内容为："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/yum.repos.d/kubernetes.repo","menus":[{"title":"使用 CRI-O","items":[["否",{"cri_o":"# "}],["是",{"cri_o":""}]]}],"code":"[kubernetes]
name=Kubernetes
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/core:/stable:/v1.28/rpm/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://pkgs.k8s.io/core:/stable:/v1.28/rpm/repodata/repomd.xml.key

{{cri_o}}[cri-o]
{{cri_o}}name=CRI-O
{{cri_o}}baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/addons:/cri-o:/stable:/v1.28/rpm/
{{cri_o}}enabled=1
{{cri_o}}gpgcheck=1
{{cri_o}}gpgkey=https://pkgs.k8s.io/addons:/cri-o:/prerelease:/main/rpm/repodata/repomd.xml.key","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"minikube","children":"Minikube"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["请到 minikube 镜像，即一些镜像站的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/github-release/kubernetes/minikube/LatestRelease/"}]," 路径下载。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Kubernetes 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
